jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Gojek is an engineer’s playground and as an experienced Backend Developer,  you will work with one of our platform engineering teams based in Singapore and engage with our product engineers to build deploy and run large scale applications. We are recruiting across different product platforms and are looking for engineers who are passionate about solving challenging problems at scale which will create an impact to millions of users. 

We are hiring across engineering teams with an emphasis on Fraud & Risk Platform, Growth Platform, Gojek SG, Driver Platform, Cartography to name a few.
jobsJson.description:

We are recruiting across different product platforms and are looking for engineers who are passionate about solving challenging problems at scale which will create an impact to millions of users.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
We understand our JD is elaborate and every skill mentioned here is not mandatory and will love for you to apply if you are interested to work with us... Apply now!!



Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:
We understand our JD is elaborate and every skill mentioned here is not mandatory and will love for you to apply if you are interested to work with us... Apply now!!

lists.content:
• Design and develop highly scalable, reliable and fault-tolerant systems
  • Build features practicing TDD and jointly produce elegant code using pair programming principles 
  • Build robust and reliable codebases and deploy polished products and systems aimed at improving customer experience
  • Work with cross-functional teams to solve tough engineering problems

    • @Gojek, you are always hitting scale & as engineers: we create, code, build, design & create IMPACT at Scale

• 5+ years of relevant software development experience with consumer/enterprise products with hands-on experience in designing, developing and deploying large-scale applications 
  • Proficiency in OOP, SQL, Design Patterns, experience with functional programming is a plus
  • Understand and implement CI/CD and well versed with Agile methodologies, TDD is a plus
  • Data modelling experience in Relational and NoSQL databases
  • Experience troubleshooting server performance - memory issues, GC tuning, resource leaks etc
  • Ability to design and implement low latency RESTful services
  • Excellent understanding of interactive application development paradigm, memory management, performance/resource optimisations, database interactions
  • Network programming, concurrency & multithreading, fault tolerance, monitoring, security and operability of systems

    • At Gojek, we primarily use Clojure, Golang, gRPC, Ruby, Kotlin, Swift and Java as our core programming languages. Familiarity with two or more is preferred
